Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="UInt32_1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="UInt32_2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SessionID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message:
Playback format:
Format: %1 Channels: %2 Samples per second: %3 Avg. Bytes per second: %4 Block align: %5 Bits per sample: %6

Event.Message:
Audio playback redirection quality mode: %2
Quality mode is a bitmask where Dynamic=0x01, Medium=0x02, and High Quality = 0x04.
